Context:
The College is named George Brown College and is located in Toronto, Ontario. It operates under the authority of the Ontario Colleges of Applied Arts and Technology Act and in accordance with the Freedom of Information and Protection of Privacy Act. The College collects personal information for various purposes including administering its statutory objects and powers, programs, activities, and carrying out other services and functions. Some of the personal information collected includes Ontario Education Numbers and student characteristics and educational outcomes which are required to be disclosed to the Ministry of Colleges and Universities (MCU) under s. 15 of the Ministry of Colleges and Universities Act. The ministry uses this data for planning, allocating and administering public funding to colleges, universities and other post-secondary educational and training institutions and to conduct research and analysis related to post-secondary education and training.

Contact information for the College's Privacy Office is provided: email at privacy@georgebrown.ca. The text also mentions that further information on the collection and use of student-level enrolment-related data can be obtained from the Ministry of Colleges and Universities (MCU) website or by writing to the Director, Postsecondary Finance and Information Management Branch, Postsecondary Education Division, 7th Floor, Mowat Block, 900 Bay Street, Toronto, ON M7A 1L2. The phone number for the College is 416-415-2000 and TTY number is 1-877-515-5559. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements and can contact ask.george@georgebrown.ca or visit the Social Media Hub for more information.

The text also includes a notice about the college's land acknowledgment and an invitation to sign up for application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, tours and more. The text ends with a disclaimer stating that the information contained in the website is subject to change without notice and should not be viewed as a representation, offer or warranty.
